subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis filed his appeal to the Court of Arbitration for Sport, setting in motion his last chance to regain the 2006 Tour de France title that was stripped because of a positive doping test.
snippet: Floyd Landis filed his appeal to the Court of Arbitration for Sport, setting in motion his last chance to regain the 2006 Tour de France title that was stripped because of a positive doping test.
